name: Jashanoid
description:
Jashanoid!
  • Destroy every brick in level.
  • Collect the falling bonuses and power-ups. You'll need them!
  • Don't let the ball fall or you'll lose lives.
  • Try to complete every level. It's a challenge.
  • Have fun!
Follow @JashLaviu on Twitter. Like JashLaviu on Fabebook.
